teaser: Microsoft acquires Nokia in a $7.2 billion deal that aims to make Microsoft a player in the mobile-phone market. Next, after two years of radiation leaks, Japan steps in to get the worsening Fukushima disaster under control. What will nearly $500 million buy? One possibility is a wall of ice that will seal the reactors and their contaminated water from the ocean. And finally, Samsung goes all Dick Tracy.
title: Marketplace for Tuesday, September 3, 2013
byline: Noel King, Steve Gardner, Queena Kim, Kate Davidson, Kai Ryssdal, Gary Sernovitz, Sam Beard and Gustavo Arellano
